revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A military essay. Containing reflections on the raising, arming, cloathing, and discipline of the British infantry and cavalry; with proposals for the improvement..."
revision.text: Possibly: A military essay. Containing reflections on the raising, arming, cloathing, and discipline of the British infantry and cavalry; with proposals for the improvement of the same. By Campbell Dalrymple, Esq; Lieutenant Colonel to the King's own Regiment of Dragoons. Part the First. (London : printed for D. Wilson, at Plato's Head, in the Strand, MDCCLXI [1761]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2288184~S5
